title: Steve Schwarzman Is Blackstone’s Billion-Dollar Man
sub_head: Blackstone CEO took home a record $1.1 billion in 2021, underscoring the private-equity giant’s growing dominance on Wall Street
body: Blackstone Inc. Chief Executive Officer Stephen Schwarzman took home a record $1.1 billion in 2021, underscoring the private-equity giant’s growing dominance on Wall Street.
